      Methods in com.sri.ai.grinder.polynomial.api with parameters of type Monomial 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default boolean Monomial.areLikeTerms(Monomial other)
      Convenience method that uses the ordered union of non-numeric factors from this and the other Monomial to provide the second argument to areLikeTerms(Monomial, List).
      default boolean Monomial.areLikeTerms(Monomial other, java.util.List<Expression> factors)
      Two monomials M1 and M2 are like terms wrt a tuple of factors F if signature(M1, F) = signature(M2, F).
      Examples:
      com.sri.ai.util.base.Pair<Monomial,Monomial> Monomial.divide(Monomial divisor)
